Control Name: Assesses Changes in Leadership—The entity considers changes in management and respective attitudes and philosophies on the system of internal control.

control_attributes.Control: Assesses Changes in Leadership—The entity considers changes in management and respective attitudes and philosophies on the system of internal control.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC3.4 COSO Principle 9: The entity identifies and assesses changes that could significantly impact the system of internal control.
